technology: The participant did not experience any technical difficulties during the conversation.
cur_neg_affect: The participant did not express any negative affect about the pandemic/masks/vaccine/boosters in the present.

communal_orientation: The participant actively listened to the conversation partner, shared their own experiences, and asked follow-up questions, showing a moderate level of engagement and interest in connecting with the other person.
engagement: The participant was actively involved in the conversation, sharing personal experiences, asking questions, and responding thoughtfully to the other person's comments, indicating a high level of engagement.
defensiveness: The participant did not display any defensive behavior or try to justify their beliefs/perspective in a confrontational manner.

general_notes: The participant is older and has a strong belief in vaccines due to their experiences with diseases before vaccines were widely available. They are very open about their health concerns and their willingness to follow medical advice.
